name: Bodhi Tree
description: BOT, as the digital stock of Banyan Tree Technology Co., Ltd., provides users with all-round services based on the principle of global layout and user supremacy, constantly updates the high-quality ecosystem with current asset value in the DEFI sector, constantly explores the advanced value of the DEFI+web3+metauniverse, and brings users a value-added experience. At the same time, it makes BOT more scarce and value-added with technology ecology, A more professional, high-quality and responsible vision empowers users' asset appreciation.
